title: Evaluate Workflow Merging (13)
---
### Evaluate if `chunk processor` and `tree action decider workflow` should be merged based on LLM assessment, involving specific files.

Evaluate what an LLM thinks about the `chunk processor` and `tree action decider workflow` to determine if they are unnecessary and should be merged into the `tree action decider workflow`.

Files involved:
`backend/text_to_graph_pipeline/chunk_processing_pipeline/tree_action_decider_workflow.py`
`backend/text_to_graph_pipeline/chunk_processing_pipeline/chunk_processor.py`
